name: Umbral Scion
prerequisiteFormula: @cha_score >= 13 AND @wis_score >= 13 AND @feat:drow_nobility AND @feat:greater_drow_nobility AND @feat:improved_drow_nobility AND "Able to use drow spell-like abilities" AND @race:drow
descriptionText: New spell-like abilities are unlocked for you as you rise to ascendency among the drow people.
